mapper.select: select HALL_SELECT_NO as hallSelectNo, Hall_Type as hallType, HALL_NO as hallNo, HALL_SELECT_PRICE as hallSelectPrice, HALL_SELECT_ETC as hallSelectEtc from hall_select where hall_no=#{hallNo}
select HALL_SELECT_NO as hallSelectNo, Hall_Type as hallType, HALL_NO as hallNo, HALL_SELECT_PRICE as hallSelectPrice, HALL_SELECT_ETC as hallSelectEtc from hall_select where hall_select_no=#{result}
